reason:
Node 1.5.3 has no declared dependencies but logically depends on:
- Node 1.5.1: provides the identity A(t)_+ = P(t)A(t)P(t), which is needed to write Tr(A(t)_+) = Tr[P(t)A(t)] (using cyclicity of trace).
- Node 1.5.2: establishes the 'generic gamma' hypothesis (no zero eigenvalue), which is the actual reason P(t) is locally constant and hence dP/dt = 0.
These dependencies should be declared.
